intro: Habenaria arechavaletae var. elata, commonly known as the Elegant Habenaria, is a rare orchid species native to the mountainous regions of South America. It is characterized by its tall, erect stem and clusters of pale green to white flowers with distinctive, spurred petals. The plant typically blooms during the late spring to early summer, showcasing its delicate floral structure. It thrives in cool, humid environments and requires well-drained, acidic soil for optimal growth. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
